description.value:
Clerics of the Chaos Dominion learn the following spells when able to cast Cleric spells of the same spell level.  These spells are always prepared and don’t count against your prepared spell amount.  

Dominion spells are considered Cleric spells when learned this way.  

 

Chaos Dominion Spells

Able to Cast

Spells

1st Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.7N5KBCOM40ZX65EO]{Arcane Arrows}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.PZLUQ36LJVGLMZ4R]{Lash Out}

2nd Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.A0XHQ6VS7PDGN9FJ]{Cloak}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.FZ8CHP8N6M0PGLI1]{Discombobulate}

3rd Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.VROEDKWBUZ57MFV7]{Rolling Thunder}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.TA1E58P8XATOBEQH]{Virulent Outbreak}

4th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.YL8USCAX1ZTDKOA1]{Shapeshift}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.7H0M1UB9Z1ZVHSJ0]{Remove Arms}

5th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.LAT1CHJ5SCDL566O]{Reincarnate}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.RS1WH90WHNO7H1AR]{Kinetic Burst}
